description: Pascal's triangle (excluding first, last two elements of each row) read by rows, row n read mod n.
comments: Prime numbered rows contain all zeros.
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=4..100 of triangle, flattened
prog: (Haskell)a053202 n k = a053202_tabl !! (n - 4) !! ka053202_row n = a053202_tabl !! (n - 4)a053202_tabl = zipWith (\k row -> take (k - 3) $ drop 2 row)                       [4..] $ drop 4 a053200_tabl-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 24 2014
crossrefs: Sum of row n = A053205(n). Cf. A053200, A053201, A053203, A007318 (Pascal's triangle)
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Dec 12, 1999
extensions: a(44) corrected by T. D. Noe, Feb 08 2008
